works.description: Audiovisual footage and production content relating to cricket matches of the ICC World Twenty20 Sri Lanka 2012 cricket tournament (“ICC WT20 2012”) governed by the International Cricket Council ("ICC") are transmitted with license and authorization via television broadcast from match locations across Sri Lanka by the ICC's broadcast partners and official licensees.

Audiovisual footage and production content relating to cricket matches of the ICC World Twenty20 Sri Lanka 2012 cricket tournament (“ICC WT20 2012”) governed by the International Cricket Council ("ICC") are transmitted with license and authorization via television broadcast from match locations across Sri Lanka by the ICC's broadcast partners and official licensees.
